name: Smartsheet EU
longDescription: The Smartsheet EU Integration for Microsoft Teams is only meant for Smartsheet EU customers. With Smartsheet EU for Teams enabled, Smartsheet and Teams customers can add Smartsheet assets (like sheets, reports, forms and dashboards) in their EU instance as 'Tabs' within a Teams channel. This helps their teams bring conversations together with a current view of projects, while providing a central location where they can work more effectively. In order to use this app, users must have an active “Smartsheet EU”, account please contact our support team for more details. Sign Up: https://app.smartsheet.eu/b/signup Get Started: https://help.smartsheet.com/learning-track/level-1-get-started Help: https://help.smartsheet.com/ Contact Us: https://www.smartsheet.com/contact
shortDescription: Turn Conversations into Action with Smartsheet EU and Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: Smartsheet EU
localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Die Smartsheet-EU-Integration für Microsoft Teams ist nur für Smartsheet-EU-Kunden gedacht. Wenn Smartsheet EU für Teams aktiviert ist, sind Smartsheet- und Team-Kunden in der Lage, in Ihrer EU-Instanz Smartsheet-Dokumente (wie z. B. Sheets, Berichte, Formulare oder Dashboards) als 'Tabs' innerhalb eines Teams-Kanals hinzufügen. Dadurch können Teams besser miteinander kommunizieren, einen aktuellen Überblick über Projekte erhalten und ihnen wird ein zentraler Ort zur Verfügung gestellt, an dem sie effektiver zusammenarbeiten können.

Anmelden: https://app.smartsheet.eu/b/signup 
Erste Schritte: https://help.smartsheet.com/learning-track/level-1-get-started 
Hilfe: https://help.smartsheet.com/ 
Kontakt: https://www.smartsheet.com/contact
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Gespräche in Handlungen umsetzen mit Smartsheet EU und Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: Smartsheet EU
localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
La integración de Smartsheet EU para Microsoft Teams está destinada únicamente a los clientes de Smartsheet EU. Con Smartsheet EU para Teams habilitado, los clientes de Smartsheet y Teams pueden agregar activos de Smartsheet (como hojas, informes, formularios y paneles) en su instancia EU como "Fichas" dentro de un canal de Teams. Esto ayuda a sus equipos a unir las conversaciones con una visión actual de los proyectos, a la vez que proporciona una ubicación central en la que pueden trabajar con más eficacia.

Registrarse: https://app.smartsheet.eu/b/signup 
Empezar: https://help.smartsheet.com/learning-track/level-1-get-started 
Ayuda: https://help.smartsheet.com/ 
Contáctenos: https://www.smartsheet.com/contact
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Convierta las conversaciones en acción con Smartsheet EU y Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: Smartsheet EU
localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
L’intégration de Smartsheet EU pour Microsoft Teams est uniquement destinée aux clients de Smartsheet EU. Lorsque Smartsheet EU pour Teams est activé, les clients de Smartsheet et Teams peuvent ajouter des ressources Smartsheet (comme des feuilles, des rapports, des formulaires et des tableaux de bord) dans leur instance EU en tant qu’« onglets » dans un canal Teams. Cela permet à leurs équipes de rassembler les conversations avec une vue actuelle des projets, tout en fournissant un emplacement central où ils peuvent travailler plus efficacement.

S’inscrire : https://app.smartsheet.eu/b/signup
Premiers pas : https://help.smartsheet.com/learning-track/level-1-get-started
Aide : https://help.smartsheet.com/
Contactez-nous : https://www.smartsheet.com/contact
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Transformer les conversations en actions avec Smartsheet EU et Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: Smartsheet EU
localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
L'integrazione Smartsheet EU for Microsoft Teams è dedicata solo ai clienti Smartsheet dell'Unione europea. Con Smartsheet EU for Teams abilitato, i clienti Smartsheet e Teams possono aggiungere le risorse Smartsheet (come fogli, report, moduli e pannelli di controllo) nella propria istanza EU come "schede" in un canale Teams. Ciò aiuta i team a tenere riunite tutte le conversazioni nella vista corrente dei progetti e fornisce un'ubicazione centralizzata dove poter lavorare in modo più efficiente.

Iscriviti: https://app.smartsheet.eu/b/signup 
Inizia: https://help.smartsheet.com/learning-track/level-1-get-started 
Guida: https://help.smartsheet.com/ 
Contattaci: https://www.smartsheet.com/contact
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Trasforma le conversazioni in azioni con Smartsheet EU e Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: Smartsheet EU
localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Smartsheet EU for Microsoft Teams 統合機能は、Smartsheet EU ユーザー専用です。Smartsheet EU for Teams が有効になっている場合、Smartsheet と Teams のユーザーは、EU インスタンスの Smartsheet 資産 (シート、レポート、フォーム、ダッシュボードなど) を Teams チャネル内の「タブ」として追加できます。これによりチームは、プロジェクトの現在の状況を把握しながら会話を進め、1 か所でより効率的に作業することが可能です。

サインアップ: https://app.smartsheet.eu/b/signup 
はじめに: https://help.smartsheet.com/ja/learning-track/level-1-get-started 
ヘルプ: https://help.smartsheet.com/ja 
お問い合わせ: https://jp.smartsheet.com/contact
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Smartsheet EU と Microsoft Teams で会話をアクションに

localizedDefinitions.name: Smartsheet EU
localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Com o Smartsheet para Teams, você pode:
1. Enviar notificações para um canal do Teams - defina as notificações do Smartsheet para serem enviadas automaticamente para um canal do Teams, para que você possa ver as alterações no Smartsheet e tomar providências imediatas nas tarefas.

2. Receber lembretes como mensagens diretas - receba notificações e lembretes do Smartsheet como mensagens diretas, analise e envie solicitações de atualização do Smartsheet e analise e aprove solicitações de aprovação do Smartsheet sem sair do Teams.

3. Adicionar "Guias" do Smartsheet em um canal do Teams - adicione planilhas, painéis e relatórios do Smartsheet como "Guias" em um canal do Teams, para reunir conversas com uma visão atual dos projetos ao mesmo tempo em que fornece um local central onde as equipes podem trabalhar de forma mais proveitosa.

Inscreva-se: https://app.smartsheet.eu/b/signup
Introdução: https://help.smartsheet.com/learning-track/level-1-get-started
Ajuda: https://help.smartsheet.com/ 
Fale conosco: https://www.smartsheet.com/contact
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Faça suas Conversas virarem Ação com Smartsheet EU e Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: Smartsheet EU
localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Интеграция Smartsheet для ЕС с Microsoft Teams предназначена только для клиентов Smartsheet из ЕС. При включённой интеграции Smartsheet для ЕС с Teams клиенты Smartsheet и Teams могут добавлять ресурсы Smartsheet (таблицы, отчёты, формы, панели мониторинга) в свой экземпляр для ЕС в виде вкладок в канале Teams. Таким образом, рабочие группы получают централизованное место, где можно объединять обсуждения с текущим представлением проектов и выполнять задачи более эффективно.

Зарегистрироваться: https://app.smartsheet.eu/b/signup 
Начать работу: https://help.smartsheet.com/learning-track/level-1-get-started 
Справка: https://help.smartsheet.com/ 
Свяжитесь с нами: https://www.smartsheet.com/contact
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Превращайте слова в действия, используя Smartsheet EU и Microsoft Teams вместе
